description: The 7 Sovereign Gnostic Constants of Principia Metaphysica
note: These are archetypal names mapping mathematical constants to Gnostic emanation theology

monad.role: The Singular Origin and absolute precision anchor

pleroma.role: The Dimensional Totality (Betti-3 number of G2 manifold)
pleroma.meaning: The Fullness - the complete dimensional base

sophia.role: The Visible Gates representing manifest knowledge

demiurge.meaning: The Craftsman - structures bulk into physical metric

christos.meaning: The Redeemer - repairs variance and restores symmetry

barbelo.meaning: First Thought - the active force in 26D space

ennoia.role: The Logic Closure (E8 x E8 root lattice)
ennoia.meaning: Universal Mind - total sum of manifold potential

syzygy.role: The divine pairing gap between the two 13D shadows
syzygy.meaning: The Pneumatic Breath - energy exchange constant

horos.meaning: The Limit - contains the 24D manifold within

logos.meaning: The Word - the voice of the manifold to the observer
